dcterms:description: The Yelp dataset contains users’ review data, which is publicly available and widely used in top-N recommendation evaluation. User profile and business attribute information are also provided. Reviews with four or five stars are rated as 1 and the others are rated as 0.
dcterms:title: Yelp Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jian Liu
Chuan Shi
Binbin Hu
Shenghua Liu
Philip S. Yu
dcterms:description: The Dianping dataset contains customer review data similar to the Yelp Dataset. The reviews are converted to implicit feedback and prepared in a similar way as the Yelp dataset.
dcterms:title: Dianping Dataset

dcterms:description: The Koubei dataset is associated with Koubei.com, which belongs to Alibaba’s local service company. The dataset is used to predict user’s click-through rate (CTR) and conversion rate (CVR) of candidate items.
dcterms:title: Koubei Dataset
